message.content:
I need to identify the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly referred to as "depreciation" in financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" under the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section.

The value for "Depreciation" is listed as 92870.67 on 2024-02-05.

This is exactly what I'm looking for, as depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '92870.67'} }
```
